description: Production-ready CQRS and Event Sourcing framework for building serverless applications on AWS with NestJS, DynamoDB, and other AWS services.
rules: This framework uses CQRS (Command Query Responsibility Segregation) pattern with Event Sourcing
Commands are processed asynchronously by default, use *Sync methods for synchronous processing
All entities use pk (partition key) and sk (sort key) for DynamoDB storage
Multi-tenancy is built-in - always include tenantCode in operations
Version control is automatic - use VERSION_LATEST constant for latest versions
Data sync handlers are used to synchronize data to external systems like RDS
The framework uses NestJS dependency injection patterns
